tool.name: obitab
tool.description: converts sequence file to a tabular file

param.name: output_seq_option
param.label: Do you want to add an extra column?
param.help: Use this option if you want to add an extra column at the end of the table for the sequence itself

param.name: no_definition_option
param.label: Do you want to remove column containing the sequence definition?
param.help: Use this option if you want to remove column containing the sequence definition in the output tab file

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
obitab command converts sequence file to a tabular file that can be open by a spreadsheet program or R
